column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////When my ramen came out
column2: my almond shaped eyes turned into heart shapes. Food shouldn't be this beautiful. But sometimes it's more beautiful than you and me
column4: that's acceptable. I added a seasoned egg because come on
column5: egg. And asked for lots of fresh garlic. They bring you your own garlic grinder and peel garlic and I went to town with that. Bad breathe
